title: Help needed! no response from server
body:
As soon as I try to log in, it skips directly to ''Did not receive a response from the server - attempt 1'' then quickly skips to ''attempt 2'' then ''attempt 3'' then ''The login server did not respond. You may have a connection issue that is not related to the League of Legends server. ''

All in less than 5 seconds!

I've tried uninstalling the game and reinstalling it, synchronizing my Windows clock, tried the Hextech Repair Tool... Nothing's helping!

Anyone has a clue how I could fix this?

replies.body:
im having the same problem. ive uninstall, atm in the middle of reinstalling.  some poeple are saying to restart pc, others are saying yo do this

Open CMD (Windows Button + R, type cmd)

In this order type

ipconfig/release ipconfig/renew ipconfig/flushdns

It will tell to restart and patch, if the error pops up again repeat.

This definitely sounds like an issue caused by an *unstable* or *poor connection* to the login servers. I'd strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure there aren't any conflicting settings on your local network.

Please let me know if those steps caused any sort of change.
